comments.content: Sweet, Vincent :) Btw: have you ever considered adding small caps and osf to Comic Sans?

Adding to CS? Imagine 2 billion users trying to download an update — that would bring the web to it’s knees…

I think someone needs to make stickers or magnets of various street sign type set in comic sans that can seamlessly cover the original type. I wonder how many people would be like, "Did you see the cool new street signs?".
